<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<!DOCTYPE project>
<epcis:EPCISDocument xmlns:epcis="urn:epcglobal:epcis:xsd:1"
	xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
	xmlns:example0="http://ns.example.com/epcis0" xmlns:example1="http://ns.example.com/epcis1"
	xmlns:example2="http://ns.example.com/epcis2" xmlns:example3="http://ns.example.com/epcis3"
	xmlns:example="http://ns.example.com/epcis" creationDate="2005-07-11T11:30:47.0Z"
	schemaVersion="1.2">
	<EPCISBody>
		<EventList>
			<ObjectEvent>
                        <eventTime>2017-09-15T00:23:05.548-04:00</eventTime>
                        <recordTime>2017-09-15T00:23:05.548-04:00</recordTime>
                        <eventTimeZoneOffset>-4:00</eventTimeZoneOffset>
                        <baseExtension>  <eventID>urn:epc:id:sgtin:88000269.7.2</eventID></baseExtension>
                        <epcList>  <epc>urn:epc:id:sgtin:88000269.2027.20000012</epc></epcList>
                        <action>OBSERVE</action>
                        <bizStep>urn:epcglobal:cbv:bizstep:driving</bizStep>
                        <disposition>urn:epcglobal:cbv:disp:on_the line</disposition>
                        <readPoint>
                            <id>urn:epc:id:sgln:8800026900016.2027.2</id>
                        </readPoint>
                        <bizLocation>
                            <id>urn:epc:id:sgln:8800026900016.2027.2</id>
                        </bizLocation>
                        <bizTransactionList>
                            <bizTransaction type="urn:epcglobal:cbv:Bus:status">http://transaction.acme.com/po/urn:epcglobal:cbv:bizstep:driving</bizTransaction>
                        </bizTransactionList>
                        <BIS:id xmlns:BIS="http://ns.example.com/id">urn:entity:santander:transport:bus:busArrivalEstimation:7:2</BIS:id>
                        <BIS:refBusStop xmlns:BIS="http://ns.example.com/refBusStop">urn:entity:santander:transport:bus:busStop:7</BIS:refBusStop>
                        <BIS:refBusLine xmlns:BIS="http://ns.example.com/refBusLine">urn:entity:santander:transport:bus:busLine:2</BIS:refBusLine>
                        <BIS:remainingDistances xmlns:BIS="http://ns.example.com/remainingDistances">[0]</BIS:remainingDistances>
                        <BIS:remainingTimes xmlns:BIS="http://ns.example.com/remainingTimes">["P0DT0H0M0S"]</BIS:remainingTimes>
                        <BIS:destinationBusLines xmlns:BIS="http://ns.example.com/destinationBusLines">["CONSUELO BERGES"]</BIS:destinationBusLines>
                        <BIS:shortID xmlns:BIS="http://ns.example.com/shortID">NA</BIS:shortID>
                        <BIS:remainingStations xmlns:BIS="http://ns.example.com/remainingStations">NA</BIS:remainingStations>
                        <BIS:companyName xmlns:BIS="http://ns.example.com/companyName">NA</BIS:companyName>
                        <BIS:location xmlns:BIS="http://ns.example.com/location">NA</BIS:location>
                        <BIS:dateModified xmlns:BIS="http://ns.example.com/dateModified">2017-09-15T04:21:55.00Z</BIS:dateModified>
                    </ObjectEvent>
		</EventList>
	</EPCISBody>
</epcis:EPCISDocument>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE project>
<epcis:EPCISDocument xmlns:epcis="urn:epcglobal:epcis:xsd:1"
xmlns:p="http://www.unece.org/cefact/namespaces/StandardBusinessDocumentHeader"
xmlns:example="http://ns.example.com/epcis" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
creationDate="2005-07-11T11:30:47.0Z" schemaVersion="1.2">
<EPCISHeader>
<p:StandardBusinessDocumentHeader>
<p:HeaderVersion>1.2</p:HeaderVersion>
<p:Sender><p:Identifier Authority="">p:Identifier</p:Identifier></p:Sender>
<p:Receiver><p:Identifier Authority="">p:Identifier</p:Identifier></p:Receiver>
<p:DocumentIdentification>
<p:Standard>EPCglobal</p:Standard>
<p:TypeVersion>1.2</p:TypeVersion>
<p:InstanceIdentifier>p:InstanceIdentifier</p:InstanceIdentifier>
<p:Type>MasterData</p:Type>
<p:MultipleType>true</p:MultipleType>
<p:CreationDateAndTime>2001-12-31T12:00:00</p:CreationDateAndTime>
</p:DocumentIdentification>
</p:StandardBusinessDocumentHeader>
<extension>
<EPCISMasterData>
<VocabularyList>
<Vocabulary type="urn:gs1:epcis:santander:bus:line:info">
<VocabularyElementList>
<VocabularyElement id="urn:epc:id:sgtin:88000269.201.103">
<attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/stop/id">urn:entity:santander:transport:bus:busLine:103</attribute>
<attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/line/localID">103</attribute>
<attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/line/shortID">N3</attribute>
<attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/line/name">PEÃ‘ACASTILLO-PLAZA DE ITALIA </attribute>
<attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/line/refBusStops">[urn:entity:santander:transport:bus:busStop:307,urn:entity:santander:transport:bus:busStop:308,urn:entity:santander:transport:bus:busStop:309,urn:entity:santander:transport:bus:busStop:310,urn:entity:santander:transport:bus:busStop:311,urn:entity:santander:transport:bus:busStop:321]</attribute>
<attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/line/refStartBusStop">NA</attribute>
<attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/line/refEndBusStop">NA</attribute>
<attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/line/busLineType">NA</attribute>
<attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/line/startTime">NA</attribute>
<attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/line/endTime">NA</attribute>
<attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/line/intervalNorm">NA</attribute>
<attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/line/intervalHoli">NA</attribute>
<attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/line/intervalPeak">NA</attribute>
<attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/line/datemodified">2017-09-13T22:13:27.00Z</attribute>
</VocabularyElement>
</VocabularyElementList>
</Vocabulary>
</VocabularyList>
</EPCISMasterData>
</extension>
</EPCISHeader>
<EPCISBody>
<EventList>
</EventList>
</EPCISBody>
</epcis:EPCISDocument>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE project>
<epcis:EPCISDocument xmlns:epcis="urn:epcglobal:epcis:xsd:1"
	xmlns:p="http://www.unece.org/cefact/namespaces/StandardBusinessDocumentHeader"
	xmlns:example="http://ns.example.com/epcis" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
	creationDate="2005-07-11T11:30:47.0Z" schemaVersion="1.2">
	<EPCISHeader>
		<p:StandardBusinessDocumentHeader>
		    <!-- Required -->
			<p:HeaderVersion>1.2</p:HeaderVersion>
			<p:Sender>
				<p:Identifier Authority="">p:Identifier</p:Identifier>
			</p:Sender>
			<p:Receiver>
				<p:Identifier Authority="">p:Identifier</p:Identifier>
			</p:Receiver>
			<p:DocumentIdentification>
			    <!-- Required -->
				<p:Standard>EPCglobal</p:Standard>
				<!-- Required -->
				<p:TypeVersion>1.2</p:TypeVersion>
				<p:InstanceIdentifier>p:InstanceIdentifier</p:InstanceIdentifier>
				<!-- Required -->
				<p:Type>MasterData</p:Type>
				<p:MultipleType>true</p:MultipleType>
				<p:CreationDateAndTime>2001-12-31T12:00:00</p:CreationDateAndTime>
			</p:DocumentIdentification>
		</p:StandardBusinessDocumentHeader>
		<extension>
			<EPCISMasterData>
				<VocabularyList>
					<Vocabulary type="urn:gs1:epcis:santander:bus:stop:info">
                        <VocabularyElementList>
                            <VocabularyElement id="urn:epc:id:sgtin:88000269.200.90">
                                <attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/stop/id">
					urn:entity:santander:transport:bus:busStop:90</attribute>
                                <attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/stop/refBuses">NA</attribute>
                                <attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/stop/shortID">90</attribute>
                                <attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/stop/busStopCount">NA</attribute>
                                <attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/stop/name">Barrio Las Tejeras</attribute>
                                <attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/stop/location">
					[-3.878289196,43.438962839]</attribute>
                                <attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/stop/datemodified">
					2017-03-27T22:25:55.00Z</attribute>
                                <attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/stop/address">Barrio Las Tejeras</attribute>
                                <attribute id="http://epcis.example.com/bus/stop/direction">Ojaiz</attribute>
                            </VocabularyElement>
                        </VocabularyElementList>
                    </Vocabulary>
				</VocabularyList>
			</EPCISMasterData>
		</extension>
	</EPCISHeader>
	<EPCISBody>
		<EventList>
		</EventList>
	</EPCISBody>
</epcis:EPCISDocument>

request.description: List all containers under busInformationSystem Application
